qas.question: What sport do Somalis most enjoy?
What is the name of the Somali national football team?
In what year did the Ocean Stars first compete in the Olympics?
Along with Liban Abdi, Ayub Daud and Abdisalam Ibrahim, who is a notable Somali football player?
Along with the Somalia Cup, what is an important Somali football competition?

context: <a0_0>Football<a0_0/> is the most popular sport amongst Somalis. Important competitions are <a4_0>the Somalia League<a4_0/> and Somalia Cup. The multi-ethnic <a1_0>Ocean Stars<a1_0/>, Somalia's national team, first participated at the Olympic Games in <a2_0>1972<a2_0/> and has sent athletes to compete in most Summer Olympic Games since then. The equally diverse Somali beach soccer team also represents the country in international beach soccer competitions. In addition, several international footballers such as <a3_0>Mohammed Ahamed Jama<a3_0/>, Liban Abdi, Ayub Daud and Abdisalam Ibrahim have played in European top divisions.
